description: Verify command compliance rules — spec.md content vs codebase drift check

rules.description: Must spawn verifier agent via Task tool with subagent_type 'project-mapper:verifier'.
Must Read .claude/spec.md (either in command pre-flight or within the verifier agent).
Must run Analysis Protocol tool calls — at minimum Glob and Grep to explore actual codebase (not just read spec.md).
Report must include 'Sections checked', 'Accurate', and 'Drift' counts.
When drift is found, must include section number and specific issue description with classification (INACCURATE, MISSING, or OUTDATED).
